name: status
description: Show voting status of current daytime.

name: vote
description: A command for everyone to vote an user.

name: kill
description: A command for role Werewolf to kill an user.

name: guard
description: A command for role Guard to guard an user.

name: seer
description: A command for role Seer to seer an user.

name: reborn
description: A command for role Witch to reborn an user.
